languages.custom: understands the languages of its creator but can’t speak

description.value: Plate consists of shaped, interlocking metal plates to cover the entire body. A suit of plate includes gauntlets, heavy leather boots, a visored helmet, and thick layers of padding underneath the armor. Buckles and straps distribute the weight over the body.
A shield is made from wood or metal and is carried in one hand. Wielding a shield increases your Armor Class by 2. You can benefit from only one shield at a time.

The helmed horror makes two longsword attacks.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 1d8 + @mod type=slashing average=true]] damage, or [[/damage 1d10 + @mod type=slashing average=true]] damage if used with two hands.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Magic Resistance. The helmed horror has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Spell Immunity. The helmed horror is immune to three spells chosen by its creator. Typical immunities include fireball, heat metal, and &Reference[lightning]{lightning} bolt.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Reduced Threat. This creature has -2 penalty on all ability checks and saving throws.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].
